name: yawningly
content:
yawningly adverb
(BORING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes you yawn, for example because you are bored or tired: Instead of having the work finished on time, he gave us a range of yawningly familiar excuses. The work of doing data entry is long and yawningly tedious, so it helps to take breaks throughout the day.
More examplesFewer examplesWe had to sit through a yawningly long introduction before the curtain went up. While some people find football fun to watch, others find it yawningly dull.
